short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension block text content from getting flagged or blocked by the moderation filter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this extension is to gain more freedom in ChatGPT.
The extension only hides the moderations prompts, OpenAI still flags the messages.

This extension allows the user to:
- block content from getting censored after it's written  (In red or removed)
- block content from flagged censored after it's written  (In orange)
